note:
Retired 60-something cultural theorist and creative sector policy wonk with Linux sysadmin side hustle, neurodivergent, queer, non-binary. Based in London UK. To me pronouns are an invention of the devil to confuse language learners, I'm not bothered for myself but respectful of people who do care!

Photo is just a profile pic of me with an old xkcd cartoon that I lost the link for and reverse image search can't find the original. It's a drawing of a light switch labelled "utterly obsessed/uninterested" - apologies to the cartoonist, I'd credit them if I could.
